General.Name: Phapros Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Phapros, Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the pharmaceutical and health care industry in Indonesia. The company operates through Branded / Ethical Prescription Drugs; Over the Counter (OTC) Drugs; Generic Prescription Drugs; and Toll-in Manufacturing segments. It offers OTC drugs, including Antimo Anak, Livron B Plek, Noza, Hemorogard, Bioron, and others. The company also provides generic drug products for government institutions and hospitals, as well as produces drugs for other pharmaceutical industries; and offers medical devices. It exports its products. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Phapros, Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kimia Farma (Persero) Tbk.
